mapper.sql: auth_no, menu_no, use_yn, rgster_no, rgst_dtm, moder_no, mod_dtm
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.system.repository.master.SyAuthorityMenuDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE sy_authority_menu
auth_no = #{authNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_no = #{menuNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_yn = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE auth_no = #{authNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND menu_no = #{menuNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
